member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Calculator_v1_vb.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Calculator_v1_vb.calculatorForm.ButtonOn_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Function to set ON the calculator. The calculator will not work until this button is pressed (isOn = true) It also clears every stored data regarding operands and operators (clear all) [C].

member.name: M:Calculator_v1_vb.calculatorForm.ButtonClearError_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When 'CE' button is clicked, the displayed value is set to 0 and the subtotal is resetted.

member.summary: If a number (or the dot) is clicked,

member.summary: Function when the button 'plus' is clicked

member.summary: Function when the button 'minus' is clicked

member.summary: Function when the button 'product' is clicked

member.summary: Function when the button 'quotient' is clicked

member.name: M:Calculator_v1_vb.calculatorForm.ButtonSolve_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When button 'solve' is clicked, the arrays that contain the series of operands and operators are looped in order to make those operations consecutively and saving and adding the result of each loop in 'subtotal' global variable.

member.name: M:Calculator_v1_vb.calculatorForm.ButtonPlusMinus_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: (For calculator III) This button makes negative a positive number, and vice-versa)

member.summary: This button makes the operation 1/x

member.summary: This function deletes the last introduced character

member.summary: Menu to change to standard

member.name: M:Calculator_v1_vb.calculatorForm.moveButtons(System.Int32)
member.summary: This function moves buttons to the right or to the left, to make other buttons fit into the form

member.summary: It calculates the factorial of the current subtotal and resets the operands and operators

member.summary: It calculates any exponent, square, cube or customized.

member.summary: This function opens a new form, called HelpWindow, where some help information is showed.
